resources.string: Apply themes to Facebook. Choose from 41 different Folio themes*. Switch layouts and more. \n\n*Themes are unlocked with a purchase key. Purchases are optional.

Display a floating action button to post status updates to Facebook via Folio. When used in the default layout the FAB will not hide. When used with removed Facebook bar and removed toolbar, the FAB will hide. This will disable Facebook themes and Facebook layouts. This is also very buggy at the momment.
Turn notifications on or off for messages, friend request and all other notifications. Switch on vibrate or set your LED.
Image downloaded and saved to download folder

Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.
Learn about the different libraries used in Folio. Get its source on GitHub, join us on Facebook and more.
Long click images to save them.
If you like our work please consider purchasing an item by tapping here to support development. You will receive an unlock key to enable more features.
Tap here to read more about the licences used in Folio.
Clear Folio\'s data. This will also log you out.
Have a question? Need help? Tap here to send us an email.
Enter purchase key to unlock features.
Auto scroll to hide Facebook\'s menu?
For launcher icons for Folio & Folio Messenger. Also some navigation drawer icons. Also help with development on portions of the original app FrontPage. Tap here to visit his website.
For help with cover photos. Check out his Facebook client.
For use of the full screen video playback webview code found in Tinfoil. Checkout Tinfoil for Facebook.
Join Creative Trends Beta on Facebook.
Join Folio for Facebook on Google+
For sharing an interest in technology and being patient while daddy worked.
For being supportive and encouraging throughout the past years. Thanks for letting me borrow the laptop.
For their new graph api. Also for their mobile site which is used in Folio.
For AppCompat v7, also for open sourcing your Material Design icons.
Tap here to fork the project.
Tap here to fork the project.
Tap here to fork the project.
Reduce data usage be removing images.
Turn navigation bar translucent. Only works on api 19+.
Remove Facebook bar and show FAB to post.
Hide Folio\'s Toolbar. The navigation drawer can still be pulled out from a left swipe.

Purchases are 100% optional and help with development. Purchases are processed via PayPal. After you\'ve chosen your purchase amount above, and PayPal has processed your purchase, you will receive a key to unlock features in Folio. This helps to keep Folio free and without the need for ad support.
To ensure your notification preference is saved, please tap to apply your changes. This will relaunch Folio.
Notifications & badges will be checked every %s.
